data.claim: ComfyUI API Service pivot: "Bring Your Own Compute" (BYOC) template platform is the optimal model - users run locally or bring API keys, platform provides templates + workflow UX + marketplace. Zero compute cost for platform owner.
data.snippet: Stop being a "compute company" and become a "template + workflow + UX company." That keeps your uniqueness (templates users can customize) and removes the biggest cost sink (GPUs).
